lego: if I asked you to help me
practice_phrases: If I asked you.
如果我要求你。
If I wanted you to work.
如果我想你工作。
If I asked you to help me today.
如果我要求你今天帮助我。
If I asked you to help me finish.
如果我要求你帮助我完成。
If I asked you to help me find it.
如果我要求你帮助我找它。
If I asked you to help me answer the question.
如果我要求你帮助我回答这个问题。
If I asked you to help me finish everything in time.
如果我要求你帮助我及时完成所有事情。
If I asked you to help me make sure everything was finished.
如果我要求你帮助我确保所有事情都完成了。
If I asked you to help me find the money on the table.
如果我要求你帮助我找在桌子上的钱。
If I asked you to help me answer the question they were asking.
如果我要求你帮助我回答他们在问的这个问题。

seed_context.known: What would you do if I asked you to help me?
seed_context.target: 如果我要求你帮助我，你会做什么？

practice_phrases: I asked you to help me.

practice_phrases: I asked you.

They asked you.
